CloseWatcherCloseWatcher.summary: NOTE Experimental The CloseWatcher() constructor creates a new object.

remarks.para: You can create CloseWatcher instances without user activation, and this can be useful to implement cases like session inactivity timeout dialogs. However, if you create more than one CloseWatcher without user activation, then the newly-created one will be grouped together with the last one, so a single close request will close them both. This means that it is important to call , , and properly.
